title: abids_tool.py
description: A tool to work with BIDS formatted datasets created with dcm2niix_afni or dcm2niix, mainly to pull information from the matching JSON file and refit the input dataset using 3drefit.

input_files.title: Input Files
input_files.description: At least one 3d+time dataset in NIFTI format.

tr_match.title: TR Match
tr_match.description: Check if the TR in the json file matches the TR from input dataset header. (Returns 1 if match)

add_tr.title: Add TR
add_tr.description: Add the TR from the BIDS json file to the input dataset using 3drefit.

add_slice_times.title: Add Slice Times
add_slice_times.description: Add the slice times from the BIDS json file to the input dataset using 3drefit.

copy_prefix.title: Copy Prefix
copy_prefix.description: Copy both the NIFTI dataset(s) and matching .json file(s) to PREFIX. Must have the same number of prefixes as datasets.
